casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF Richard P. SAVITT, etc. Attorney Grievance Committee for the First Judicial Department, Respondent
v.
Richard P. Savitt, Appellant. Motion No: 2019-513 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided August 29, 2019

On the Court's own motion, appeal dismissed, without costs, upon the ground that no substantial constitutional question is directly involved.

*1320Motion for poor person relief dismissed as academic.

Motion for a stay dismissed as academic.
